issue.title: Map Configuration
issue.body:
**Original author :** Drapeau laurent

Hi 

My joomla site is in english. When i installed EasySDI everything went fine, except that the menu from the configuration panel still display the info in French while other menus are in English ...



**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Hello,

Possibly, the menu item title are not translated in English but is a copy of the french version. Have a look at in this file to check this :

web/administrator/language/en-GB/en-GB.com_easysdi_map.ini

Xavier

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

laurent, any follow-up on this issue ?
